author: jinfwhuang
content: Here is a PR that updates the beacon-chain data type on the portal network. It addresses some issues that <@!688748669268132001> raised based on their experiences in building a light client demo in lodestar. I also think that the same data types should be adopted for the rpc approach as well. For those who are interested, please review https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/pull/102
